channel.title: Ens on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Ens on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hugo Theme Walden
item.description: After reading Walden, a collection of essays by American writer Henry David Thoreau, I was deeply influenced by his love of nature and simple living. So, I wrote this concise and clear theme for my personal website and named it Walden.

item.title: Project1
item.description: Markdown is a lightweight markup language used to add formatting elements to plain text documents. This post showcases the manifestations of the markdown grammar related to text in this hugo theme.
